Name: SweeperVR
About the game: Minesweeper has finally come to Virtual Reality! Flag, count, and open cells in this fully 3D reinvention of the classic game. Features View the entire minefield in cube view, or highlight an individual plane Fully customizable minefield spawning parameters, with difficulty presets Drag, drop, scale, and rotate the minefield to locate mines from any angle Standard game mechanics and timer Professional mine-defusers and newbies alike will be able to enjoy the challenges and gameplay of SweeperVR!
